name: Flappy Nyan (itch)
description:
Flappy Nyan is a flappy nyan style game featuring nyan cat. #FlappyNyan

Flap your way through 10 fun filled levels until you can reach the end, there you will discover the complete screen and you can then sucessfully finish the game.

If for any reason you fail to reach the end fear not as you will respawn at the start of the level you was on.

Controls.

LMB = Flap

RMB = Dive

ALT+F4 = Quit

Features.

- Featuring Nyan Cat Cousin

- Featuring 10 fun filled levels

- Built using Flappy Engine
